Services

3D documentation
High-resolution 3D scanning and modeling for cultural heritage objects, ensuring accurate digital preservation.
Digitisation workflows
Comprehensive digitisation processes tailored for archives and collections, streamlining data capture and management.
Integrating IIIF
Implementation of IIIF standards for interoperable image delivery and enhanced online viewing experiences.
Bar-code solutions
Custom bar-code systems for managing digital and physical collections, improving tracking and inventory accuracy.
For Estonian museums we have developped Google Chrome plugin MuIS Helper to extend the functionality of MuIS - Estonian Museums Information System
